Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Combining quality upgrades with dimensions of enormous proportions providing every conceivable accommodation space imaginable, this beautifully presented residence by renowned builder Metricon provides all the size and space you could ever wish for on the one level. The magnificent kitchen featuring thick stone benches, glass splashback, WIP and quality stainless steel appliances overlooks the family, dining and rumpus which then open up through bi fold doors to the fantastic enclosed entertaining room with bonus second kitchen making this home the ultimate purchase for those that love to host parties. Discreetly positioned, the sleeping quarters comprise master bedroom with an abundance of storage offering both a WIR and BIR and luxurious oversize shower ensuite, whilst the 3 additional bedrooms (2 with BIRs, 1 with WIR) being serviced by the lovely main bathroom. A leisure or kids retreat area that can also be used as a study or easily converted into a 5th bedroom and a large formal lounge room complete the home. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, video intercom, high ceilings, designer lighting, floorboards to all bedrooms, quality window furnishings including plantation shutters, double remote garage with internal access and double exposed aggregate driveway accommodating off street parking for 4 vehicles and so much more. Inspection highly recommended to appreciate exactly what it is on offer.

Description:
Derrimut's Finest Location
Rarely do you find a home with both an outstanding position and flexible family floorplan. Located within walking distance of Derrimut Primary School (less than 200m) this is a home that will warm the heart and tick the dream boxes.
With stunning floating floor boards throughout this home comprises four bedrooms, master with walk in robe and full ensuite, three living areas including, family/meals, formal living and rumpus or optional 5th bedroom.
From the kitchen you will be set for entertaining overlooking your family room that opens to enclosed alfresco and pergola.
Added extras include-
- Ducted heating
- Split system cooling
- Double car garage with internal access
- Shutters
- Derrimut Primary- 200m
- Bus stop- 170m
- Sunshine Golf Club- 600m
- Derrimut Village- 800m
- Deer Park Train Station- 1.47km
*All measurements are approximate.

Description:
The GRAND Luxury Home You've Been Looking For
A home of the highest calibre, this exquisitely finished ex Porter Davis Display residence offers outstanding living on every level - from the soaring ceilings and timber plantation shutters to the premium finishes throughout - this could be the luxury home you've been searching for.
Contemporary elements permeate this 4 Bedroom plus study, 2 Bathroom home.
Flaunting a separate living zone with gas log fire, a large open plan living & dining room, a gourmet kitchen with stainless steel 900mm oven & stove top, dishwasher, walk in pantry and large bi-fold doors overlooking the amazing alfresco area.
Extraordinary thought for design and detail has been created in the timeless home also featuring executive master suite, walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity, remaining bedrooms are all oversized with B.I.R's
sharing a stylish and generously sized tiled family bathroom.
Extra features also include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm system, security doors, double remote garage, spacious laundry, low maintenance professionally
landscaped gardens all situated on a large 635m2 allotment.
Besides the long list of features, the home is brilliantly located in the heart of Derrimut and within close proximity to parks, schools, transport, Western Ring Road freeway and a choice of shopping precincts.
Be quick to inspect as opportunities like this do not last long.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Just one word WOW. This truly special residence of the Porter Davis Lifestyle range combines a modern cutting edge faade with a contemporary and sophisticated interior highlighted by gorgeous flooring and special touches and upgrades at every turn. Presenting as new, the home comprises a magnificent kitchen featuring thick stone benchtops, glass splashback, walk in pantry and quality stainless steel appliances and overlooks the meals and grand family that leads outside to the alfresco and good size rear yard providing that indoor/outdoor living we all love. Rivaling any 5 star hotel, the enormous master bedroom provides every day of the year comfort, luxury and relaxation usually only reserved for that special holiday with huge retreat, dual WIR's and sublime twin vanity, oversize shower ensuite. Three (3) additional bedrooms serviced by the lovely main bathroom and a separate formal lounge complete the home and add to the limitless living and entertaining zones this fantastic design offers. Other features include high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, designer lighting, alarm, quality window furnishings, double remote garage with internal access, double exposed aggregate driveway and low maintenance front and rear gardens. The perfect home to raise your family, to enjoy those precious moments and create those cherished memories is finally on the market.
**PHOTO ID REQUIRED.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
A prime central location, faultless presentation and your very own private backyard oasis all combine to present one lucky purchaser with the opportunity to own this magnificent Metricon home. Superbly designed, the open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances and WIP overlooks the dining, main living and rumpus /multipurpose room that spills out into the brilliant rear yard featuring a huge outdoor entertainment area and grassed area for the kids to play. Sleeping quarters comprise 4 spacious bedrooms, the master with large fitted walk in robe and oversize shower ensuite whilst the 3 remaining bedrooms with BIRs are serviced by the lovely central bathroom. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, quality window furnishings including plantation shutters, an abundance of storage options ( walk in linen closet and overhead cabinets in laundry) , double remote garage, gorgeous gardens with mature trees and plants providing that rare sense of serenity so close the city and so much more. A great sized allotment of approximately 550sqm right in the heart of Derrimut within a short stroll to all amenities completes this wonderful lifestyle package.

Description:
SOLD BY STEVE JUSUP & NICK MAKROGLOU
First home buyers, downsizers and investors be quick to snap up this quality near new town residence where luxury upgrades combine with the ultimate location providing a lifestyle like no other with schools, community centre and magnificent Balmoral Park featuring kids playgrounds, walking trails and sporting facilities and ovals literally a few steps from your front door. Downstairs comprises a superb kitchen with thick stone benches, glass splashback and quality stainless steel appliances that overlooks the dining and living area and spills out into a large private courtyard with entertaining deck and low maintenance gardens. A separate study with parkland views, European laundry and powder room complete the ground level. Moving upstairs you are greeted with 2 great sized bedrooms serviced by a lovely bathroom with the added bonus of the master bedroom comprising walk in robe and balcony providing the best views in Derrimut. Other great features include high ceilings on both levels, porcelain tiles, 3 split systems providing all year round comfort, extensive storage under staircase and off street parking. This is certainly not your standard townhouse, inspection highly recommended and prepare to be impressed. Boutique living at an affordable price has arrived in Derrimut.

Description:
Live Large, Live Luxuriously!
Commanding street presence and set on a huge allotment of 846m2, this beautiful family haven (51 squares) is completed from front to back & is the perfect home for a large family, tradies or developers with scope to build a second dwelling at the rear STCA.
Inviting living spaces exemplify this exceptional residence, with formal lounge, theatre room with 130 inch screen, open living/ meals zone with picturesque views of the huge alfresco and expansive garden.
Adjoining the main living zone is the well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, guest bedroom serviced by full ensuite. Step out to the massive outdoor entertaining area, generously shaded by a large pergola and is a private & peaceful space to enjoy your morning coffee or to entertain family and friends.
A beautiful staircase leads you upstairs to discover the third living area, luxurious master with a huge suite, walk-in-robe and ensuite, whilst a further 3 double-sized bedrooms (BIRs) are serviced by a family bathroom with separate WC.
Appointed with ducted heating and air-conditioning, high ceilings, powder room, 3rd bathroom, long driveway, sensor alarm, double auto garage & and a huge 4 car garage at the rear.
Live moments from freeways, bus stop, schools, parks, Derrimut village shopping centre & Golf Course.
Insights: 2 Scotney Crescent, Derrimut VIC 3030 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & STEVE JUSUP
Stockdale & Leggo Real Estate are proud to present this magnificent Derrimut residence that promises to provide not just a luxurious lifestyle but years of cherished family memories for the lucky purchaser. Four (4) separate living zones ensure all forms of entertaining are well catered for, whether relaxing casually in the main living area, watching a movie or maybe a game of pool in the huge theatre/ rumpus room, something a little more intimate in the formal lounge with feature gas fireplace or outdoor entertaining at its finest in the fantastic rear yard that comprises huge decked alfresco, water feature, bamboo fencing, storage shed and large grassed area for the kids to play. Perfectly designed for the modern family the central kitchen features stone benches, glass splashback, dishwasher, 900mm appliances and walk in pantry and overlooks the dining, rumpus, living and rear yard making supervision of children a breeze or easily incorporating all these areas into an enormous indoor/outdoor zone when celebrating those special occasions with all your friends and loved ones. Sleeping quarters comprise four (4) great sized bedrooms, the master with WIR and twin vanity, oversize shower ensuite, whilst the three (3) additional bedrooms are serviced by another quality bathroom. An endless list of extra features include a separate study, contemporary flooring, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, high ceilings, high doors, designer lighting, alarm, security cameras, video intercom, quality window furnishings, landscaped front and rear gardens, double remote garage with internal access and so much more.

Description:
After a Better Lifestyle?
Positioned for convenient access to all of Derrimut’s reputable facilities, this brick home is an opportunity you don’t want to miss.
As you walk into the home you are greeted by a modern floor plan that leads you to a large open kitchen/meals and a spacious living area. With such a large open space, you can tailor the area to suit your own ideal living set up.
The 4 generous sized bedrooms are positioned privately and the master includes a tidy modern ensuite bathroom. The new owner will enjoy low maintenance living, with an easy to clean home and a fully landscaped backyard.
Located close to Derrimut Village shopping centre, numerous bus stops, an array of restaurants and local parklands, the position allows an easy and convenient lifestyle for its owner.
With Deer Park Train Station just a short walk away, and both Ballarat Road and the Western Freeway nearby, this property ensures that your travel demands are easily met.
Ready to move into in a spectacular location, this property offers you the lifestyle you truly deserve.
Comprising of:
•
• 3 bedrooms
• 2 bathrooms (main + master ensuite)
• Private Study
• Ducted heating
• Evaporative cooling
• Good sized block
• Near public transport
• Close to shops
• Short drive to Western Freeway

Description:
Open Cancelled Contact Agent
Exclusive and uncompromising living in a secluded and private location in the highly sought after Brimbank Gardens Estate of Derrimut, this four bedroom plus study Porter Davis Prestige home is what dreams are made of.......
Be blown away by the impressive large light infusing windows which provide a sense of space, grandeur and luxury throughout. The floor plan works beautifully offering the largest of families an abundance of space in cleverly zoned living areas including, formal lounge, meals/family and theatre room.
The oversized master bedroom boasts a parents retreat, with double walk in robe and large full ensuite with duel vanities and oversized shower, whilst all other bedrooms have large built in robes with the forth bedroom also having its own full ensuite.
The centrally located entertainer's kitchen will appease the boldest of chefs with Caesar stone bench tops complimented by stainless steel appliances, butler's pantry all overlooking the Alfresco with four leaf bi-fold doors bringing the outside in for entertaining all year round.
Other magnificent features throughout include gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 3.5kw solar panel system, ducted vacuum, cctv and alarm system. Inviting a tremendous easy living lifestyle walking distance to schools, public transport, parks and minutes' drive onto the western freeway. This home is a must see for the growing family please don't hesitate to contact Chad Fowler on 0433 373 726 for more information or to arrange a private inspection.

Description:
THEY DON'T BUILD LAND ANYMORE
Sick of looking at houses that don't tick all the boxes? Discover endless possibilities when purchasing a block of land! Nestled in a prime location within Derrimut, walking distance to parklands, public transport, Derrimut Village and close to the Western Ring Road, this blank slate is awaiting for someone to build their dream home.
Contact us today to avoid missing out on this golden opportunity.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
That perfect residence we all dream about but can never find, is finally on the market. Positive first impressions are assured with the striking facade providing great street appeal. Upon entering the ultra modern interior and faultless presentation of the home will amaze and have you saying maybe, then the clincher will come once you reach the magnificent outdoor entertainment area and rear yard that will just blow you away and have you screaming YES. Flooded with natural light and with gorgeous garden views from all windows this residence is highlighted by an extra oversized master bedroom with luxurious ensuite and a superb kitchen featuring stone benches, glass splashback, 900mm appliances and huge walk in pantry that overlooks the main living area and dining space that leads out to another outdoor decked space with gas line provisions for a BBQ. Three (3) additional bedrooms with BIR?s serviced by another high quality bathroom complete the sleeping accommodation. Other features include separate lounge/ rumpus room, zoned ducted heating and refrigerated cooling, down lights, high ceilings, alarm, quality window furnishings, landscaped front and rear gardens, double remote garage with internal access and double exposed aggregate driveway accommodating off street parking for 4 vehicles. For those that enjoy the finer things in life, the time has come to spoil yourself.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU & GLEN ANTIPAS
Situated moments away from the Derrimut Village, parks, schools and transport this meticulously looked after home is your entry ticket into the popular estate of Brimbank Gardens. Comprising of three bedrooms, master with ensuite, formal lounge room, well-equipped kitchen with adjoining meals area and open plan family room that leads out to your low-maintenance landscaped rear garden. Other features include heating and cooling, alarm system and double garage with remote.
